projects.name: Space Tourism
projects.description: A Frontendmentor.io challenge made with React, a multipage web app about space tourism, destinations, the team and their technologies.

projects.name: Metal Records Store
projects.description: A demo store with some awesome metal records. It's been made with React, Router, Context and some Hooks like useState, useEffect, useReducer, etc.

projects.name: GitHub Dev Searcher
projects.description: React App made with the GitHub API, you search for developers to find their information, repos, followers; etc

projects.name: Todo App
projects.description: Made with React, a simple app to make a todo list, you can filter by all, incomplete or completed tasks. Also select light or dark themes.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Made with the Open Weather Map API, you can check the current weather in your location or other cities in the world.

projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: Made with the Pokemon API, you can search for Pokemons by name, ID or type to find images, type, statistics and general information about them, also you can save your favorites!.

projects.name: New Year Coundown Timer
projects.description: A React App which displays the remaining days, hours, minutes and seconds until new year! It works with every year. This is one of the Frontendmentor.io challenges.

projects.name: Trivia
projects.description: A trivia to test your knowledge about different topics.
